stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. click, 2 credits: Run the chosen server. The first time a subroutine would resolve during that run, prevent it from resolving.
text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. [click], 2[credit]: Run the chosen server. The first time a subroutine would resolve during that run, prevent it from resolving.
title: Tracker
